title: Potala Incense Sticks (20 sticks per pack)
description:
Patola genuine Tibetan incense is purely hand prepared from highly flavored medicinal herbs and
other precious substances. the combination of genuine scented substances makes the Patola incense
richer and superior quality than other incenses. Our incense is totally absent of choking and
camphor smell and is also non-toxic and non-habit forming. Generally, the Tibetan incense is used
for puja offering and purification but is also used as an air freshener, which keeps ones
surrounding, flavored with a good scent. Length Small ~ 6" Large ~ 10"
values_variations: Large (Pack of 1), Small (Pack of 25), Large (Pack of 25)
price_variations: Large (Pack of 1): 125.13, Small (Pack of 25): 125.13, Large (Pack of 25): 125.13

title: Fine Guru Padmasambhava Statue
description:
Padmasambhava, also called Guru Rinpoche, Tibetan Slob-dpon (“Teacher”), or Padma 'Byung-gnas
(“Lotus Born”), (flourished 8th century), legendary Indian Buddhist mystic who introduced Tantric
Buddhism to Tibet and who is credited with establishing the first Buddhist monastery there. Comes
with Jung, Sung, Clothes (Namzas). Made from Bronze. Size chart Small 9" Medium 12" *approximately
NOTE: Sizes are for height
